name: The Ritual Vestments of Duntrench
data: It increases the users wisdom divinely.
It has nice armour class for its type (superb in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration divinely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'neptune lore'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'water lore'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'saturn lore'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'pluto lore'.
